QuestData.Title: Establishing Superiority
QuestData.Description: We've one shot at dealing some damage to this place -- let's make sure we get it right.$B$BWe've acquired potent, Scourge-made, saronite bombs. But we must secure this area before we can set them off.$B$BWe're going to need to get the Scourge defenses under control quickly, before reinforcements arrive.$B$BHelp my men out and come back when you're ready for some fireworks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Kregga at Icecrown Citadel wants you to slay 10 Hulking Horrors.
QuestData.RewardText: You made quick work of the Scourge, $n. Let's finish what we came to do here.
